name: Garage Drummer VR
description: An immersive drum kit simulation in a virtual garage on a beach.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel I5 5th generation Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
